sys_cb_topic.description: Engage with me directly through this interactive feature on my portfolio website! Whether you have questions, collaboration ideas, or feedback, this tool allows you to connect with me seamlessly. Choose the type of inquiry you have, and I'll guide you through a series of questions to better understand your needs. From general inquiries to collaboration opportunities or sharing your feedback and suggestions, this interactive contact connection is designed to facilitate direct communication and foster meaningful interactions. Your messages will be sent directly to me, ensuring a prompt and personalized response. Don't hesitate to reach out—I'm here to listen, collaborate, and engage with you!
sys_cb_topic.name: servicenow portfolio Contact Connection

sys_update_version.name: sys_cb_topic_ff90f8269366021016d7fa497bba1019
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_cb_topic"><sys_cb_topic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><applicability/><applicability_mode>query</applicability_mode><autopilot_topic>false</autopilot_topic><category/><channels/><connect_queue/><context_profiles/><description>Engage with me directly through this interactive feature on my portfolio website! Whether you have questions, collaboration ideas, or feedback, this tool allows you to connect with me seamlessly. Choose the type of inquiry you have, and I'll guide you through a series of questions to better understand your needs. From general inquiries to collaboration opportunities or sharing your feedback and suggestions, this interactive contact connection is designed to facilitate direct communication and foster meaningful interactions. Your messages will be sent directly to me, ensuring a prompt and personalized response. Don't hesitate to reach out—I'm here to listen, collaborate, and engage with you!</description><dialog_acts_enabled>false</dialog_acts_enabled><expose_on_palette>false</expose_on_palette><flexible_conversation_switching>true</flexible_conversation_switching><foundational>false</foundational><graph>{

          "greetingResponse": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "Hello and welcome to my portfolio's interactive contact section! I'm delighted to have you here. This is where you can connect with me directly, whether it's to ask questions, explore collaboration opportunities, or share your feedback. Let's begin our conversation and see where it takes us!"
                  }

          "actionDefinition": {
            "id": "c14b118193f6861016d7fa497bba1062",
            "latest_snapshot_id": "c14b118193f6861016d7fa497bba1062",
            "parent_id": "595045899336861016d7fa497bba10c4",
            "type": "action",
            "name": "get_task",
            "label": "Get_task",
            "scope_id": "837eb8c59336861016d7fa497bba1023",
            "description": "This action is designed to synchronize Salesforce task details with corresponding records in ServiceNow. It utilizes a ServiceNow Flow to retrieve all task records from Salesforce, processes the output, and then compares the received Salesforce data with existing records in the 'customer_account' table in ServiceNow. For each Salesforce account record, it checks if a corresponding record already exists in ServiceNow based on a unique identifier ('correlation_id').  The script is configured to run synchronously in the foreground, allowing access to the outputs of the ServiceNow Flow.",
            "category": "Task Management",
            "parameters_have_loaded": true,
            "input_parameters": [
              {
                "supported_input_modes": [

                  "data_pill",
                  "data_entry"
